name: Rocket Raiders
description:
We used to think space was empty.

But space is far from empty.

Blast your way through mega-parsecs of tumbling debris!

Destroy marauding enemy spacecraft before they destroy you!

Collect precious spaceship powerups to help your fight!

Rack up the best scores you can in ROCKET RAIDERS!!

Two separate exciting game modes: BASIC ROXX mode and an all-new MOSH PIT ROXX mode, each with their own leaderboard to challenge.
